nodes.text: Tokuut was a terrestrial astronomical object on which the rebel trooper Pol Andrissus of the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry became known for actions other members of the company saw as heroic sometime by the year 3 ABY. His actions on the world were remembered in a conversation between members of the 61st following his funeral in 3 ABY.
Tokuut was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
